thread.title: Martellus Bennett’s nice tweet about Magic fails
thread.title_full: Martellus Bennett’s nice tweet about Magic fails

author: USA TODAY
title: Martellus Bennett’s nice tweet about Magic fails
text:
Martellus Bennett’s nice tweet about Magic fails Whoops. Post to Facebook Martellus Bennett’s nice tweet about Magic fails Whoops.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/martellus-bennett-magic-johnson-five-minutes-talk-tweet-burn-oops-nice-twitter/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Martellus Bennett’s nice tweet about Magic fails Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 5:31 p.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 
New England Patriots Martellus Bennett is interviewed on the field after a win against the Atlanta Falcons at Super Bowl 51 on Sunday, February 5, 2017 in Houston, TX. (Photo: AP) 
Martellus Bennett is a Super Bowl champion and champion tweeter , and on Tuesday he told several stories. 
One of those stories was about Magic Johnson, which was perfect timing since Magic was named the Lakers president of basketball operations on Tuesday. Some saw this news as a good thing, others see it as a very bad thing, but everyone was making jokes on Twitter , so when Martellus tweeted this, people thought it was a funny way to burn Magic. I had a conversation with Magic Johnson when I was 21 and a rookie. Damn I wish I had that 5 minutes back. — Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 21, 2017 
Got him! Martellus wishes he never talked to Magic! But the thing is, that's not what the Patriots tight end was trying to say. He was trying to say that he wished he had used those five minutes more wisely. He explained in a couple of more tweets.
